title: 怎么用命令方块放置带命令的命令方块
author: yigengcong
txt_content:
如题...
用/setblock指令或者/summon都可以
不过放置之后需要里面带命令qwq
版本:1.7.2/1.7.10

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~ ~ command_block 0 keep {Command:"命令"}
写错，写成give的格式了= =

replies.author: 史蒂夫勇者
replies.txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:command_block {Command:{指令}}
当它被充能时激活

replies.author: yigengcong
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2016-8-14 11:46
/setblock ~ ~ ~ command_block 1 0 keep {Command:"命令"}
/summon FallingSand ~ ~ ~ {Time:1,Tile:137,T ...
然而显示数据标签分析失败.....

replies.author: yigengcong
replies.txt_content:
史蒂夫勇者 发表于 2016-8-14 11:46
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:command_block {Command:{指令}}
当它被充能时激活
我试过了，两个都不行，他的summon可以

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~ ~ command_block 0 keep {Command:"命令"}
亲测可用
